text:
[Verse]
Whispers in the wind blow
Secrets that we both know
Stars up high they glow
Lighting where we’ll go

[Verse 2]
Night's embrace so gentle
Hearts beat like a tempo
Dreams that make us tremble
In this endless limbo

[Chorus]
Feel the magic round us
Worlds collide and trust
We're the ones they talk of
In the stories told with dust

[Verse 3]
Moonlight in your eyes shine
Hands forever entwined
In this moment divine
Lost but we don’t mind

[Bridge]
Softly now we fall
Answering the call
Say you hear it all
In our quiet hall

[Verse 4]
Candles on the pavement
Memories where we went
Love is what we meant
In the air it's spent
title: Whispers in the Wind
